code: import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./HospitalDoctorSelection.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const doctors={1:[{id:1,name:"Dr. Alice Brown",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/400x300/?doctor"},{id:2,name:"Dr. John Smith",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/400x300/?doctor"}],2:[{id:3,name:"Dr. Sarah Lee",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/400x300/?doctor"},{id:4,name:"Dr. David Kim",image:"https://source.unsplash.com/400x300/?doctor"}]};function DoctorSelection(){const{hospitalId}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();if(!hospitalId||!doctors[hospitalId]){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"error",children:"Invalid Hospital Selection"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hospital-doctor-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"title",children:"Select a Doctor"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:doctors[hospitalId].map(doctor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",onClick:()=>navigate("/canvas/".concat(doctor.id)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:doctor.image,alt:doctor.name,className:"card-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card-title",children:doctor.name})]},doctor.id))})]})});}export default DoctorSelection;
